member.name: SHARE_ROLE
member.summary: Specifies the access permissions assigned to the Users or Public folder. Used in and .

member.name: SHARE_ROLE.SHARE_ROLE_READER
member.summary: The contents of the folder can be read, but not altered or added to.

member.name: SHARE_ROLE.SHARE_ROLE_CONTRIBUTOR
member.summary: The contents of the folder can be read and altered. New items can be added, however items can be deleted only by the user that contributed them.

member.name: SHARE_ROLE.SHARE_ROLE_CO_OWNER
member.summary: The contents of the folder can be read, changed, or added to.

member.name: SHARE_ROLE.SHARE_ROLE_OWNER
member.summary: Not normally used in the context of this interface.

member.name: SHARE_ROLE.SHARE_ROLE_CUSTOM
member.summary: The folder is shared, but the share role is neither SHARE_ROLE_READER, SHARE_ROLE_CONTRIBUTOR, or SHARE_ROLE_CO_OWNER.

member.name: SHARE_ROLE.SHARE_ROLE_MIXED
member.summary: Not used in the context of this interface.
